name: Roronoa Zoro
text: On Play (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area): Return a character with a cost of 5 or less to their owner's hand.

effect.text: Return a character with a cost of 5 or less to their owner's hand.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and has a '6000' counter value. Rarity is 'R' as printed. Power is 6000. No life value printed.
